full_summary:
Title
==============

**Establishment of a Canadian Surface Combatant (CSC) Industry Working Group (CIWG) for In-Service Support (ISS)**

Government of Canada Notice
----------------------------

Reference Number: WS4546328849-Doc4546443826
Notice Type: Request for Information (RFI)
Publication Date: April 24, 2024
Notice Closing Date: N/A

Abstract
--------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) intends to establish a joint Industry Government working group for the Canadian Surface Combatant (CSC) class of vessels. Canada is seeking input and advice from interested and capable suppliers to assist in the development of the In-Service Support (ISS) requirements for the CSC vessels. The working group will provide recommendations on the future competitive procurement of ISS services for the CSC.

Key Information
---------------

* Solicitation Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Procurement Category: [Manufacturers and products for the furniture trade - Others]
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None specified
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR), World

Eligibility Criteria
--------------------

Suppliers are self-attesting to their suitability for CIWG membership in accordance with Section 8 of the Letter of Interest (LOI).

 Notice URL
------------

The full notice is available on: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19475624?extsite=MTk0NzU2MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

 Suppliers who are interested and capable must submit their letter of interest to participate as a member of the CIWG. It is not necessary to provide and attachment with the response to this notice. Cairney, Roxanne (SPAC/PSPC) shall be pleased to receive the LOI with any comments and suggestions you may have – contact information (ro return email: roxanne.cairney@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  )

 **Please note that the RFI is for the purpose of getting general information about the supply, and it is non-binding**.
